artefact.alternative_title: Agricultural surveys about the land, crops and livestock on your farm
artefact.overview: Collecting land, crops and livestock information and surveying farm management practice with Defra agriculture surveys
artefact.more_information:
You must complete a Defra agricultural survey in June and December each year. You'll need to supply information about the land, crops, livestock and workers on your farm. 

You'll need to have your County Parish Holding (CPH) number when you sign up.

^If you are an agent you can [sign up for Defra Farm Surveys and Assessments.](https://secure.services.defra.gov.uk/wps/portal/wfa/!ut/p/c5/04_SB8K8xLLM9MSSzPy8xBz9CP0os3gzdx8LQyd_A0t3X3dHA08fM1fvAEdXY3cTI6B8JE55A3dDSnQbmBHQHQ5yLX7b8cmDzAfJG-AAjgb6fh75uan6BbmhEQaZAekAekimGQ!!/dl3/d3/L2dBISEvZ0FBIS9nQSEh/ "sign up as an agent for Defra Farm Surveys and Assessments"){:rel="external"}^

If you have any queries about agricultural surveys, contact the Defra Helpline.

$C

**Defra Helpline**  
<onlinehelp@defra.gsi.gov.uk>  
08459 33 55 77  
Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm

$C



*[Defra]: Department for Environmental Food and Rural Affairs
artefact.introduction:
Fill out your Department for Environmental Food and Rural Affairs (Defra) agricultural survey online. 

*[Defra]: Department for Environmental Food and Rural Affairs
